title: Interprocess Communication via Shared Memory Atomic Operations
text: goal semaphore enable synchronization concurrent R processes. Implements named semaphores Boost C++ library. Semaphores managed operating system, responsible ensuring integer value can safely incremented decremented multiple processes. Processes can also wait (blocking) value become non-zero. Works cross-platform, including Windows, MacOS, Linux.

title: Interprocess Communication via Shared Memory Atomic Operations
code: # Install the latest stable version from CRAN: install.packages("semaphore")  # Or the development version from GitHub: install.packages("pak") pak::pak("cmmr/semaphore")

title: Interprocess Communication via Shared Memory Atomic Operations
code: library(semaphore)  s <- create_semaphore() print(s) #> [1] "uUkKpNMbTVgaborHG4rH"  increment_semaphore(s)  decrement_semaphore(s, wait = FALSE) #> [1] TRUE decrement_semaphore(s, wait = FALSE) #> [1] FALSE  remove_semaphore(s) #> [1] TRUE

title: Interprocess Communication via Shared Memory Atomic Operations
text: Open two separate R sessions machine. Session 1 - Producer Session 2 - Consumer
code: library(semaphore) s <- 'mySemaphore'  create_semaphore(s)  # enable session 2 to output 'unblocked!' three times increment_semaphore(s) increment_semaphore(s) increment_semaphore(s)  remove_semaphore(s) library(semaphore) s <- 'mySemaphore'  for (i in 1:3) {    # Block until session 1 increments the semaphore   decrement_semaphore(s)      # Do some work   message('unblocked!') }  message('finished')

title: Shared Memory Atomic Operations — create_semaphore
text: semaphore integer operating system keeps track . process knows semaphore's identifier can increment decrement value, though decremented zero. semaphore zero, calling decrement_semaphore(wait = FALSE) return FALSE whereas decrement_semaphore(wait = TRUE) block semaphore incremented another process. multiple processes blocked, single call increment_semaphore() unblock one blocked processes.

title: Shared Memory Atomic Operations — create_semaphore
code: create_semaphore(id = NULL, value = 0, cleanup = TRUE)  increment_semaphore(id)  decrement_semaphore(id, wait = TRUE)  remove_semaphore(id)

title: Shared Memory Atomic Operations — create_semaphore
text: id semaphore identifier (string). create_semaphore() defaults generating random identifier. value initial value semaphore. cleanup Remove semaphore R session exits. wait TRUE, blocks semaphore greater zero.

title: Shared Memory Atomic Operations — create_semaphore
text: create_semaphore() - created semaphore's identifier (string), invisibly semaphore non-NULL. increment_semaphore() - TRUE, invisibly. decrement_semaphore(wait = TRUE) - TRUE, invisibly. decrement_semaphore(wait = FALSE) - TRUE decrement successful; FALSE otherwise. remove_semaphore() - TRUE success; FALSE error.

title: Shared Memory Atomic Operations — create_semaphore
code: library(semaphore)           s <- create_semaphore()     print(s) #> [1] "SwlKLUUEdLieexomb92Q"          increment_semaphore(s)     decrement_semaphore(s, wait = FALSE) #> [1] TRUE     decrement_semaphore(s, wait = FALSE) #> [1] FALSE          remove_semaphore(s) #> [1] TRUE
